messages.content:
JS app called "Tubl Web Version 1.0" with a random number A between 0.01 and 1000 and B a random number between 0.01 and 1000, displaying the message: "A tube has been created of diameter [A] and length [B]" with [A] and [B] replaced by their respective values, and a button to generate a new tube (blue button).
Make sure everything is in a single HTML file with embedded CSS and JS in a single code block to be used as a web app.

length and diameter should be displayed with the unit "cm"
Make sure everything is kept in a single HTML file with embedded CSS and JS in a single code block to be used as a web app.
